      • chooseRoll

        public int chooseRoll(boolean attacking,
                      int min,
                      int max,
                      Territory attacker,
                      Territory defender)
        Description copied from interface: Player
        The Player chooses their roll. They are notified of whether they are attacking or not, the minimum and maximum amount of dice they can roll, the attacking Territory and the defending Territory.
        Parameters:
        attacking - Whether they are attacking or not
        min - The minimum dice roll they can pick
        max - The maximum dice roll they can pick
        attacker - The attacking Territory
        defender - The defending Territory
        Returns:
        The roll the Player chose

      • takeOver

        public int takeOver(int min,
                    int max)
        Description copied from interface: Player
        When a Territory that was just attacked is taken over the Player chooses to move between min and max troops to the Territory.
        Parameters:
        min - The minimum number of armies they have to move
        max - The maximum number of armies they can move
        Returns:
        The number of armies they want to move
